episodes.description: Through Japanese retailers' efforts to apply new technologies and the passion of the foreign sake-lovers, sake is now becoming a global beverage with genuine sake breweries opening outside Japan.
episodes.title: SAKE R-Evolution: A Fever Brewing across the Globe

episodes.description: The French mindset is churning a revolution in sake. A Japanese brewer adopts the concept of terroir, and the former cellar master at Dom Perignon uses the art of assemblage to make the ultimate sake.
episodes.title: SAKE R-Evolution: Heady Milestones in a New Era
